definition: see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: I want players to enjoy the 'aha!' of solving a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望玩家能享受解決一個謎題後“啊哈”的感覺。

sentences.english: Just a rookie lawyer, Wright as he solves a variety of puzzling cases.
sentences.chinese: 身爲新人律師，成步堂解決了衆多謎題般的案件。

sentences.english: The contemporary riddle culture includes sophisticated puzzles for both children and adults.
sentences.chinese: 現代的謎語文化中也有老少皆宜的精妙謎題。

sentences.english: As is so often the case with the Big Questions in physics, we'll have to wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 就像衆多物理學的大謎題一樣，讓我們拭目以待吧。

sentences.english: How do you determine when a puzzle is too difficult?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何決定一個謎題的難易程度的？

sentences.english: The answer to this riddle is very interesting to me.
sentences.chinese: 這個謎題的答案讓我非常感興趣。

sentences.english: Unlock bonus challenges and re-play puzzles and mini-games.
sentences.chinese: 解鎖獎勵挑戰，重溫謎題個小遊戲。

sentences.english: Get your casebook ready and go to the next page for our first puzzler.
sentences.chinese: 準備好你的案例簿到下一頁看我們的第一個謎題。

sentences.english: The infinite nature of the puzzle keeps the fun alive in his work.
sentences.chinese: 無窮無盡的謎題讓他保持着對工作的樂趣。

sentences.english: The vault door will be locked and will require the PC to solve a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 保險庫門被鎖而且將需要玩家控制角色解決一個謎題。

sentences.english: The number but section is all the rage the world the number anagram topic game.
sentences.chinese: 數獨是一款風靡世界的數字謎題遊戲。

sentences.english: By Bob Smyth HARRY POTTER is at the centre of a mystery over new titles for his adventures.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特正在新的書名和他的冒險的謎題中心。

sentences.english: How it all factors into true love is even more mysterious.
sentences.chinese: 而這些因素是如何變爲“真愛”就更是個謎題了。

sentences.english: Clearly this riddle is referring to Mr. Freeze.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，這個謎題在暗示急凍人。

sentences.english: Data from Spitzer finally seems to have solved the riddle.
sentences.chinese: 從斯皮策得來的數據貌似解決了這個謎題。

sentences.english: Give in to the unknown for a while and ponder the mystery.
sentences.chinese: 注意一下那些未知的部份並琢磨這些謎題。

definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
(idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4
